prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Rapid Development enables the creation of AI applications in minutes instead of weeks. This approach emphasizes focusing on desired outcomes rather than low-level implementation details, significantly accelerating the development process.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: AI Applications in Minutes: Rapid Development
